TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理客户端身份验证过程中调用的身份验证模块。

span.span: Manages the authentication modules called during the client authentication process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个静态类，用于管理应用程序使用的身份验证模块。 is a static class that manages the authentication modules that an application uses. 当请求受保护的资源，调用方法以获取实例，以便在后续请求中使用。When a request is made to protected resources, the calls the method to get an instance to use in subsequent requests. 通过调用查询的每个注册的身份验证模块方法为每个模块。The queries each registered authentication module by calling the method for each module. 若要返回的第一个身份验证模块实例用于请求进行身份验证。The first authentication module to return an instance is used to authenticate the request. 模块，提供基本、 摘要式、 协商、 NTLM 和 Kerberos 身份验证类型注册到默认情况下。Modules that provide the basic, digest, negotiate, NTLM, and Kerberos authentication types are registered with the by default. 实现的附加身份验证模块接口可以使用添加方法。Additional authentication modules that implement the interface can be added using the method. 身份验证模块添加到列表中的顺序调用。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. > [!NOTE] > Kerberos 和 negotiate 身份验证类型不支持在 Windows 95/98 或 Windows NT 4.0 上。The Kerberos and negotiate authentication type is not supported on Windows 95/98 or Windows NT 4.0. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
static member Authenticate : string * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

span.span: The challenge returned by the Internet resource.
The that initiated the authentication challenge.
The associated with this request.

summary.span: 调用每个已注册的身份验证模块以查找第一个可响应身份验证请求的模块。

span.span: Calls each registered authentication module to find the first module that can respond to the authentication request.

returns.span: 类的实例，包含授权尝试的结果。

span.span: An instance of the class containing the result of the authorization attempt.

returns.span: 如果没有身份验证模块响应质询，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no authentication module to respond to the challenge, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用直到模块之一使用响应每个注册的身份验证模块上的方法实例。The method calls the method on each registered authentication module until one of the module responds with an instance. 第一个实例返回用于对请求进行身份验证。The first instance returned is used to authenticate the request. 如果没有身份验证模块可以对请求进行身份验证方法将返回`null`。If no authentication module can authenticate the request, the method returns `null`. 身份验证模块的调用与注册顺序。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they are registered with the .

span.span: is .
-or- is .
-or- is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.ICredentialPolicy CredentialPolicy
Public Shared Property CredentialPolicy As ICredentialPolicy
public: static property System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ CredentialPolicy { System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentialPolicy ^ value); };
member this.CredentialPolicy : System.Net.ICredentialPolicy with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置凭据策略，该凭据策略将用于使用 类发出的资源请求。

span.span: Gets or sets the credential policy to be used for resource requests made using the class.

value.span: 一个实现 接口的对象，该接口确定凭据是否随请求一起发送。

span.span: An object that implements the interface that determines whether credentials are sent with requests.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 凭据策略将确定是否发送网络资源，例如 Web 页面的内容的请求时发送的凭据。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a request for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果发送凭据，可以尝试对客户端进行身份验证，而不是发送，该值指示客户端的凭据所需的响应收到请求时需要客户端身份验证服务器。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response indicating that the client's credentials are required. 虽然这省去了与服务器的往返过程，这必须与通过网络发送凭据所固有的安全风险进行权衡。While this saves a round trip to the server, this must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 目标服务器不需要客户端身份验证时，最好不发送凭据。When the destination server does not require client authentication it is best to not send credentials. 凭据策略将仅为请求指定的凭据或使用调用对象，指定凭据。The credential policy will be called only for requests that specify credentials or use a object that specifies credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置凭据策略。The following code example demonstrates setting the credential policy. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary { get; }
.property class System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary CustomTargetNameDictionary
Public Shared ReadOnly Property CustomTargetNameDictionary As StringDictionary
public: static property System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ CustomTargetNameDictionary { System::Collections::Specialized::StringDictionary ^ get(); };
member this.CustomTargetNameDictionary : System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取包含服务主体名称 (SPN) 的字典，这些 SPN 用于在 Kerberos 身份验证期间为使用 及其派生类发出的请求标识主机。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains Service Principal Names (SPNs) that are used to identify hosts during Kerberos authentication for requests made using and its derived classes.

value.span: 一个可写的 ，它包含构成主机信息的键的 SPN 值。

span.span: A writable that contains the SPN values for keys composed of host information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPN 是客户端唯一地标识服务或应用程序进行相互身份验证的服务器上的实例名称。An SPN is a name by which a client uniquely identifies an instance of a service or application on a server for purposes of mutual authentication. 默认情况下，请求相互身份验证时，你可以通过设置要求它到在请求中。Mutual authentication is requested by default, and you can require it by setting to in your request. 当要求相互身份验证，SPN，为客户端必须提供目标。When a requires mutual authentication, the SPN for the destination must be supplied by the client. 如果您知道 SPN，你可以将其添加到之前发送请求。If you know the SPN, you can add it to the before sending the request. 如果未向此字典中，添加 SPN 的信息使用方法组合最有可能的 SPN; 但是，这是一个计算的值，可能是不正确。If you have not added SPN information to this dictionary, the uses the method to compose the most likely SPN; however, this is a computed value and might be incorrect. 如果进行相互身份验证尝试失败，可以检查来确定计算得出的 SPN 的字典。If mutual authentication is attempted and fails, you can check the dictionary to determine the computed SPN. 如果身份验证协议不支持相互身份验证，不会有 SPN 将输入到字典。No SPN is entered into the dictionary if the authentication protocol does not support mutual authentication. 若要将 SPN 值添加到此字典中，使用的作为键。To add an SPN value to this dictionary, use the of the as the key. 在内部，该密钥将被截断以包括， ，和如果它不是默认端口。Internally, the key is truncated to include the , , and the if it is not the default port. > [!NOTE] > 访问方法和属性需要不受限制。Accessing the methods and properties of the requires unrestricted . > [!NOTE] > 通过代理执行 Kerberos 身份验证时，代理和最终宿主名称需要解析为 SPN。When Kerberos authentication is performed through a proxy, both the proxy and the ultimate host name need to be resolved to an SPN. 代理名称解析受超时。The proxy name resolution is protected by a timeout. Ultimate 的主机名为的 SPN 的解决方法需要 DNS 查找，并没有直接与此操作关联的超时设置。Resolution of the ultimate host name to a SPN requires a DNS lookup, and there is no timeout associated directly with this operation. 因此同步操作可能需要更长超时。Therefore synchronous operations may take longer to timeout. 若要解决此问题，向之前发出请求到其 SPN 缓存中添加 ultimate 主机的 URI 前缀。To overcome this, add the ultimate host's URI prefix to the SPN cache prior to making requests to it. 当 未设置属性时，3.5 SP1 现在默认指定在 NTLM（NT LAN 管理器）身份验证交换中 的 SPN 的请求 URL 中使用的主机名。Version 3.5 SP1 now defaults to specifying the host name used in the request URL in the SPN in the NTLM (NT LAN Manager) authentication exchange when the property is not set. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于在客户端请求中的 中指定的主机标头。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the Host header specified in the in the client request. 在请求 URL 中使用的主机名可能不同于服务器的实际主机名、服务器的计算机名、计算机的 IP 地址或环回地址。The host name used in the request URL may be different from the actual host name of the server, the machine name of the server, the computer's IP address, or the loopback address. 在这些情况下，Windows 将无法通过身份验证请求。In these cases, Windows will fail the authentication request. 若要解决此问题，可能需要通知使用的主机名的 Windows 客户端在请求 URL 中请求 ("contoso"，例如) 是实际在本地计算机的备用名称。To address the issue, you may need to notify Windows that the host name used in the request URL in the client request ("contoso", for example) is actually an alternate name for the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的内容。The following code example demonstrates displaying the contents of the . [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate(class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Shared Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: static System::Net::Authorization ^ PreAuthenticate(System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
static member PreAuthenticate : System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

span.span: A to an Internet resource.
The associated with the request.
Preauthenticates a request.

returns.span: 如果可以对请求进行预身份验证，则为 类的实例，否则为 。

span.span: An instance of the class if the request can be preauthenticated; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果 为 ，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果身份验证模块可以预身份验证请求，方法将返回身份验证实例并将授权信息发送到提前而不是等待要发出质询的资源服务器。If the authentication module can preauthenticate the request, the method returns an Authentication instance and sends the authorization information to the server preemptively instead of waiting for the resource to issue a challenge. 此行为在 RFC 2617 的 3.3 节中所述 (HTTP 身份验证： 基本和摘要式访问身份验证)。This behavior is outlined in section 3.3 of RFC 2617 (HTTP Authentication: Basic and Digest Access Authentication). 支持预身份验证的身份验证模块允许客户端通过避免引起的身份验证质询的额外往返行程提高服务器的效率。Authentication modules that support preauthentication allow clients to improve server efficiency by avoiding extra round trips caused by authentication challenges. 可以进行预身份验证的授权模块请求集属性设置为`true`。Authorization modules that can preauthenticate requests set the property to `true`.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。

span.span: Registers an authentication module with the authentication manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的调用的模块列表的末尾添加身份验证模块方法。The method adds authentication modules to the end of the list of modules called by the method. 身份验证模块添加到列表中的顺序调用。Authentication modules are called in the order in which they were added to the list. 如果模块具有相同是已注册，此方法删除已注册的模块并将添加`authenticationModule`到列表的末尾。If a module with the same is already registered, this method removes the registered module and adds `authenticationModule` to the end of the list. ## Examples 下面的示例向身份验证管理器注册身份验证模块。The following example registers an authentication module with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Authentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供允许列表的实例注册要读取的身份验证模块。The property provides an instance that enables the list of registered authentication modules to be read. 方法将模块添加到列表中，和方法模块从其移除。The method adds modules to the list, and the method removes modules from it. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性获取的身份验证管理器注册的身份验证模块的列表。The following example uses the property to get a list of authentication modules that are registered with the authentication manager. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的身份验证模块列表中移除指定的身份验证模块方法。The method removes the specified authentication module from the list of authentication modules called by the method. 该模块必须已添加到列表使用方法之前可以从列表中删除。The module must have been added to the list using the method before it can be removed from the list. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以从已注册的模块列表中删除指定的身份验证模块。The following example uses the method to remove the specified authentication module from the list of registered modules. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example, refer to the class.
